text: commonly called , is a manga series written by Nico Tanigawa. It was made into an anime series which is directed by Shin Ōnuma. ==Plot== The series follows fifteen-year-old Tomoko Kuroki during her time in high school as she tries to change from an unsociable loner into a popular teenager. ==Anime== The anime started broadcasting in Japan on July 8, 2013 and ended on September 23, 2013. The anime was directed by Shin Ōnuma and is written by Takao Yoshioka. An original video animation episode was released with the seventh manga volume on October 22, 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website (manga) *Official website (anime) Category:Anime Category:2013 television series debuts Category:2013 establishments in Japan
title: WataMote
